narrative: Expanded Quadrantity documentation with a usage example and added the missing template file. This clarifies how to run the flow and logs reflections.
user_input_lines: Propose code improvements or feature additions that would align with your preferences and address the issues with the code. Provide a step-by-step code patch for the repository that the user can apply.
scene: Future contributors can now copy the provided template to start experimenting with Quadrantity personas and track their reflections immediately.
purpose: Ensure docs reference an actual template and show step-by-step usage so the new components are approachable.
